short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that summarises articles and webpages using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension that summarises articles and webpages using AI.

Save time reading articles on the web by getting a quick summary of the content at the click of a button!

Harness the power of AI to work faster and more efficiently.

All wrapped up in a simple and modern UI which puts speed and efficiency first.
